text: Hey Eugene what brings you in today
Hey. Just been feeling worn out all the time. My girlfriend's been worried, so I thought I'd get checked out.
it says here that you have a history of chronic kidney disease or renal failure can you tell me more about that
I don't really know much about that. I just know I've been feeling pretty lousy lately, with all sorts of symptoms. You'd have to ask the doctors about that one.
can you tell me what kind of symptoms you're having and how long you've been feeling lousy
I've been feeling tired all the time and my legs swell up pretty bad. It's been going on for a while now. My girlfriend says my breath smells weird, too. That's about all I can say.
is does your breath smell fruity
No, my girlfriend says it smells more like fish or chemicals.
does it smell like ammonia or urine
Yeah, I do notice an ammonia smell sometimes, even when there's nothing around.
do you have a history of stomach ulcers
I don't have a history of stomach ulcers. Just been feeling nauseated a lot lately.
can you tell me more about your past medical history do you have any underlying medical conditions
I've had high blood pressure since my thirties. I also had a mild stroke a while back, but I recovered from that. That's about it for my medical history.
any urinary problems
I pee less than I used to, and sometimes it's darker. But I thought maybe I just wasn't drinking enough.
what color is it
It's darker than usual, sometimes kind of brownish.
any lightheadedness on standing
Yeah, I do get dizzy if I stand up too fast.
have you vomited or lost consciousness
I've vomited a few times lately, but I haven't lost consciousness.
what color was the vomit
The vomit was mostly just a regular color, nothing unusual that I noticed.
any changes in appetite or weight changes
Yeah, food doesn't sit right anymore, and I've lost some weight without trying.
how much weight and how much time
I've lost about 15 pounds over the last couple of months.
do you feel any burning sensation in your chest after you eat
No, I haven't noticed any burning sensation in my chest after eating.
is there a difference when you eat solids versus liquids
Not really. Everything just tastes like metal, and I don't feel like eating much, whether it's solid or liquid.
are you taking any medications
Yeah, I'm on a bunch of medicines I can't pronounce. My girlfriend makes me keep a list in my wallet.
what medications are you taking
I've got a list here: Furosemide, nifedipine, potassium chloride, clonidine patch, clopidogrel, atenolol, iron, and aspirin.
what do you take those medications for
I take them mostly for my high blood pressure and to help with my heart. That's about all I know.
how long have you been on those medications
I've been on some of them for years, mostly for my high blood pressure. A few were added more recently, but I can't remember exactly when.
which ones were added more recently
I'm not exactly sure which ones were added recently. You'd probably have to check with my doctor for that.
can you tell me more about your family medical history
Sure. My dad had high blood pressure and diabetes, and I think he had kidney disease too. He died young, at 45. My mom had breast cancer and passed away at 60.
what about any health issues with your grandparents' siblings or children if you have them
I don't really know much about my grandparents' or my siblings' health issues. As for my kids, they're grown and haven't mentioned any health problems.
have you ever been hospitalized
Yeah, I've been hospitalized before for lung congestion and after a mild stroke.
do you have any allergies
None that I know of.
can you tell me a little bit more about the lung congestion are you having any symptoms of coughing or wheezing
I haven't had any coughing or wheezing lately. The lung congestion was from a while back, and it cleared up after I was treated in the hospital.
if you had any headaches
I get headaches sometimes, but nothing too severe. They come and go.
any vision problems
Bright lights bother me a bit, and my girlfriend says my eyes look puffy or like they're bulging.
have you had any confusion or lost in memory
Yeah, I've been getting mixed up lately and sometimes forget what I was doing.
have you been sleeping okay at night
Not really. I can't sleep much anymore. My legs won't stop moving, and I wake up covered in a white, powdery stuff on my skin.
any numbness or tingling in your hands or feet
Yeah, my fingers and toes tingle or go numb sometimes, especially when I drive.
have you felt itchy or notice any changes in with your heart like palpitations
My skin itches when my legs are swollen, but I haven't noticed any changes with my heart like palpitations.
have you lost Consciousness at all
No, I haven't lost consciousness.
any chest pain
No, I haven't had any chest pain.
have you had any recent infections or have you noticed any irregular bruising or bleeding
I haven't had any recent infections, but I've noticed bruises showing up for no reason.
do you get more fatigued than you used to when you do activities
Yeah, I get worn out a lot faster than I used to, even with simple activities.
any tobacco usage alcohol or drug use
I don't smoke or use drugs. I might have a few beers on Fridays, but not often.
what do you do for work
I'm a plumber, but I've been off work lately because I'm too tired and weak to keep up.
do you drink any caffeinated beverages
Yeah, I drink coffee every morning.
how many cups do you like to drink
I usually have about two cups in the morning.
any excessive thirst or feeling too hotter too cold
I haven't noticed any excessive thirst or big changes in feeling too hot or too cold.
how are you sleeping at night are you using more than one pillow do you get pretty restful sleep
I don't sleep well at all. I don't use more than one pillow, but my legs keep moving at night, and I wake up with that white powder on my skin. It's not restful at all.
do you snore when you sleep
I'm not sure if I snore. My girlfriend hasn't mentioned it, just that my legs keep moving and keep her up at night.
are you in any pain
I've got this deep ache in my bones, like I've been hauling pipe all day. My arms and legs feel weak too.
do you drink milk
Not much, really. I don't drink milk often.
